Question: Shenzhen Beienda Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Beienda Technology Co., Ltd

Smart Watches

- Established in 2013
- Specializes in smart watch manufacturing
- Focuses on industry-leading technology, excelsior design, and rigorous quality standards
- Offers R&D, software & hardware customization, production, and sales
- More than 9 years of experience in R&D and production
- More than 10 professional engineers in the R&D team
- Vibrant sales team
- Launches 5-8 high-quality private new products with innovative technology and design every quarter
- Exports products to more than 36 countries and regions
- Long-term cooperative relations with more than 100 brand customers
